# GET /v1/gameCenterLeaderboardSets/{id}/relationships/localizations | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/gameCenterLeaderboardSets/{id}/relationships/localizations ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterLeaderboardSets-_id_-relationships-localizations)

-  GET /v1/gameCenterLeaderboardSets/{id}/relationships/localizations 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/gameCenterLeaderboardSets/{id}/relationships/localizations

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterLeaderboardSets-_id_-relationships-localizations#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterLeaderboardSets/{id}/relationships/localizations
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterLeaderboardSets-_id_-relationships-localizations#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterLeaderboardSets-_id_-relationships-localizations#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterLeaderboardSets-_id_-relationships-localizations#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[GameCenterLeaderboardSetLocalizationsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterleaderboardsetlocalizationslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterLeaderboardSets-_id_-relationships-localizations#see-also)

### [Reading leaderboard sets](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterLeaderboardSets-_id_-relationships-localizations#Reading-leaderboard-sets)

[`Read leaderboard set information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterleaderboardsets-_id_)Read information about a specific leaderboard set.[`List leaderboard information for a leaderboard set`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterleaderboardsets-_id_-gamecenterleaderboards)Read the leadboards that belong to a learderboard set.[`List leaderboard sets in a group leaderboard set`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterleaderboardsets-_id_-groupleaderboardset)List information about leaderboards and leaderboard sets in a group leaderboard set.[`List all localizations for a leaderboard set`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterleaderboardsets-_id_-localizations)Get a list of localized metadata for a leaderboard set.[`Read the leaderboards in a leaderboard set`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterleaderboardsets-_id_-relationships-gamecenterleaderboards)List all leaderboards in a leaderboard set.[`Read the group leaderboard set in a leaderboard set`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterleaderboardsets-_id_-relationships-groupleaderboardset)List all the group leaderboard sets in a leaderboard set.[`List releases for a leaderboard set`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterleaderboardsets-_id_-releases)Read the state of releases for a leaderboard set and related information.[`GET /v1/gameCenterLeaderboardSets/{id}/relationships/releases`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterleaderboardsets-_id_-relationships-releases)
